title: ICE: ERROR:rbml::reader: failed to find block with tag 7

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Found this while refactoring my library after the `Vector` -> `Slice` rename

STR:

``` rust
use std::{mem, raw};

fn main() {
    let a = &[1, 2, 3i];
    let raw::Slice { data: ptr, len: len }: raw::Slice<int> = unsafe { mem::transmute(a) };
    let b = unsafe { mem::transmute(Slice { data: ptr, len: len }) };
    // ICE                          ^~~ forgot the `raw::` qualifier
}
```

Backtrace:
